entry.title: new life
entry.content:
it’s true that i’ve lost myself in last 4 years. i waste my most time in wondering around,this lead to the blog’s name. that’s why i choose “wonder around lose kernel”. people always say none of us can live without dreams. those who have a beautiful dream can creat a beautiful life .But when the first time we met real life,everthing changed.

entry.title: time of me
entry.content:
my compution life This is a my loved things on web .

international | google | facebook | github mainland | douban | weibo | Bybh UI | skype | qq,icq | gtalk language | IDL | word | python major | OE | ASTRO | …..
international google facebook github
mainland douban weibo Bybh
UI skype qq,icq gtalk
language IDL word python
major OE ASTRO …..

;;

things always changes, time always gone,every people should know how to slove the problem in our ways.

we can’t change the world in short time,but we can do it after time past.

i dare not change my fucking fool life style,so i make myself down.

BUT,i know that people always failed and depressed without truely work hard.

loser always here and there .

so how about a little change!!
